HBIPS-5 Measure Description: Patients discharged on multiple antipsychotic medications with appropriate justification
SUB-2/-2a Measure Description: Alcohol use brief intervention provided or offered
SUB-3/-3a Measure Description: Alcohol and other drug use disorder treatment provided or offered at discharge
TOB-2/-2a Measure Desc: Tobacco use treatment provided or offered
TOB-3/-3a Measure Description: Tobacco use treatment provided or offered at discharge
TR-1 Measure Description: Transition record with specified elements received by discharged patients (TR1)
FUH Measure Description: Percent of patients receiving follow-up care within 30 days (FUH-30) or within 7 days (FUH-7) after hospitalization for mental illness
MedCont Measure Description: Medication Continuation Following Inpatient Psychiatric Discharge
READM-30-IPF Measure Desc: Patients readmitted to any hospital within 30 days of discharge from the inpatient psychiatric facility (READM-30-IPF)
IPFQR-HCP COVID-19 Measure Description: Percentage of healthcare personnel who completed COVID-19 primary vaccination series (IPFQR-HCP COVID-19)
